title: Kaow Jiaw
description: Vegetarian food restaurant located opposite the hospital and down the road from Tesco Lotus. It is a family affair and serves vegan and vegetarian food from an wide menu. Has a small grocery section selling a selection of vegetarian food stuffs and some frozen mock meats. It's about a 10 minute drive from Maenam Kwai Road (walking street) in Kanchanaburi. The other 2 Jae restaurants on this road are buffet style.
